property.value:
# CAUTION : Save the touchOsc file after play to save all parameters (macro, snapshot, MIDI CC)
More information on github page : https://github.com/Akta3d/DropE16

-- Intern status per button (ins self.tag) -- 0 = desabled, 1 = enabled, -1 = inverted
local dblDelay = 300
local lastClickTime = 0 local singleDeadline = 0
local function getState() local v = tonumber(self.tag or "0") or 0 return v end
local function setState(s) self.tag = tostring(s) self.outlineStyle = OutlineStyle.FULL; if s == 0 then self.values.x = 0 else self.values.x = 1 if(s == -1) then self.outlineStyle = OutlineStyle.CORNERS; end end end
function update() if singleDeadline ~= 0 then local now = getMillis() if now >= singleDeadline then -- simple click confirmed singleDeadline = 0 local state = getState() if state == 0 then setState(1) -- desabled -> enabled else setState(0) -- enabled or inverted -> desabled end end end end
function onValueChanged(valueName) if valueName == "touch" and self.values.touch == false then local now = getMillis()
if now - lastClickTime < dblDelay then -- double click = inverted singleDeadline = 0 lastClickTime = 0 setState(-1) else -- start simple click timer (will be validate in update) lastClickTime = now singleDeadline = now + dblDelay end end end

local lastClickTime = 0 local singleDeadline = 0
local function getState() local v = tonumber(self.tag or "0") or 0 return v end
local function setState(s) self.tag = tostring(s) self.outlineStyle = OutlineStyle.FULL; if s == 0 then self.values.x = 0 else self.values.x = 1 if(s == -1) then self.outlineStyle = OutlineStyle.CORNERS; end end end
function update() if singleDeadline ~= 0 then local now = getMillis() if now >= singleDeadline then -- simple click confirmed singleDeadline = 0 local state = getState() if state == 0 then setState(1) -- desabled -> enabled else setState(0) -- enabled or inverted -> desabled end end end end
function onValueChanged(valueName) if valueName == "touch" and self.values.touch == false then local now = getMillis()
if now - lastClickTime < dblDelay then -- double click = inverted singleDeadline = 0 lastClickTime = 0 setState(-1) else -- start simple click timer (will be validate in update) lastClickTime = now singleDeadline = now + dblDelay end end end

value.default: To save all buttons values (snapshots and macros) : - display logs - click "SAVE" button - copy logs

CAUTION :
To load all buttons values (snapshots and macros) : - on editor mode - display script of the LOAD button - replace the value of the variable "savedMessage" by the previous saved log - start the app - click on LAOD
CAUTION : this action erase all values Save your project before
